grenade","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120179/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"au_law2001"},"dateCreated":"2005-01-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"Speed 2 Lost Control","reviewBody":"Nah, it just isn't worth watching, or renting, why? Well let's just say it didn't live up to the first one. It wasn't very fast paced, or exciting, it was very predictable. And it's mostly them on the boat, trying to get everyone out, because it is out of control. It lost most of the elements the first one had. It didn't have the 'speed' theme, it was mostly a boat out of control, how? Someone just hacked it, and there it went, it wasn't on the threat of terrorists, there wasn't the threat of a bomb explosion, and it wasn't even sinking. Where's the excitement? The movie doesn't even deserve to be called 'Speed' because there was nothing about 'speed' in it, sure it had Sandra Bullock in it, but Keanu Reeves was missing in it. If you want to see a film about a boat out of control, just watch Titanic.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":2}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":76243,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":3.9},"duration":"PT2H1M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Crveni mesec
programme.desc: Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine,... Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine, kada je austrougarska vojska okupirala Beograd. Glavni junak, mladi srpski oficir, vraća se sa ratišta u rodnu kuću. Svadba mu je, tradicionalno, već zakazana, ali zaplet priče počinje kada ćerka austrougarskog poslanika, koju igra Ivana Dudić, "baci oko" na njega. Nedopustivo za to vreme, koketna mlada dama, ne krije svoja osećanja. Rasplet njihove ljubavne drame (koja je plod mašte autora) odvija se u realnom istorijskom periodu pred Veliki rat, pa se u scenariju pojavljuje još dvadesetak glavnih likova, uglavnom stvarnih istorijskih ličnosti. Biće tu dramatičnih događanja, špijunskih intriga, diplomatskih nadmudrivanja, političkih spletki i prevara...

credits.actor: Mehmet Aslantug, Ayça Bingöl, Nur Fettahoglu, Afra Saraçoglu

programme.title: Crveni mesec
programme.desc: Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine,... Ljubavna, ali i snažna istorijska priča koja se tiče svih nas, smeštena je u period od avgusta 1913, nakon pobede Srbije u Balkanskim ratovima kada je povratila deo teoritorije, do kraja 1915. godine, kada je austrougarska vojska okupirala Beograd. Glavni junak, mladi srpski oficir, vraća se sa ratišta u rodnu kuću. Svadba mu je, tradicionalno, već zakazana, ali zaplet priče počinje kada ćerka austrougarskog poslanika, koju igra Ivana Dudić, "baci oko" na njega. Nedopustivo za to vreme, koketna mlada dama, ne krije svoja osećanja. Rasplet njihove ljubavne drame (koja je plod mašte autora) odvija se u realnom istorijskom periodu pred Veliki rat, pa se u scenariju pojavljuje još dvadesetak glavnih likova, uglavnom stvarnih istorijskih ličnosti. Biće tu dramatičnih događanja, špijunskih intriga, diplomatskih nadmudrivanja, političkih spletki i prevara...

programme.title: Jumper
Skakač
programme.desc:
Jumper: Directed by Doug Liman. With Hayden Christensen, Jamie Bell, Rachel Bilson, Diane Lane. A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0489099/","name":"Jumper","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjEwOTkyOTI3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTQxMjU1MQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0159789/","name":"Hayden Christensen"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000168/","name":"Samuel L. Jackson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0068260/","name":"Jamie Bell"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0510731/","name":"Doug Liman"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0000756/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007127/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0275286/","name":"David S. Goyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0880243/","name":"Jim Uhls"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. trailer: Jumper","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4155572505","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5NDE5MjE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjAzMjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5NDE5MjE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjAzMjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first U.S. theatrical trailer for Jumper, directed by Doug Liman."},"datePublished":"2008-02-20","description":"A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.","keywords":"teleportation,bank,theft,water,based on novel","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0489099/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"paul_3-960-896774"},"dateCreated":"2015-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slightly underrated entertaining movie","reviewBody":"Jumper is a decent movie, I might be a little bias because I've always liked this movie. The premise alone sounds amazing, the way its set up, how the characters are introduced, the action sequences, and the special effects are simply good. The film has elements of a superhero movie but is - more so than actual superhero movies these days - grounded in reality. There are very few futuristic looking gadgets, the locations and the weapons are all realistic, making the Jumpers feel like a secret part of society that could actually exist.

The characters in Jumpers seem like regular people. Millie (Rachel Bilson) acts and reacts like a normal girl whose not a comic book fan or someone who doesn't entertain the idea that teleportation is possibility. Griffin (Jamie Bell) is a bit a dick and David Rice (Hayden Christensen) doesn't even seem to realize what's happening to him, he lives in his bubble and doing his own thing - like most people would in his case.

The film does have its faults and for me there two main problems: The first, I've never read the book but from what I understand in the movie, a Jumper can withstand a large amount of electricity - higher than normal people do. But some of the hits David got in the action sequences should have killed him if he's physically like any human, which seem to be the case and would have been a great weakness to have for the character, a regular guy who can teleport. The second problems is the ending of the film, it's not the best, I could have come up with something better.

Anyway, I liked Jumper when it came out, even though I always knew that there wouldn't be a sequel. It's an entertaining movie and over the years, whenever I watched it back I found those little pop culture references that I hadn't notice before. For example this time around I noticed a Marvel Team up reference that is kind of overused but is still cool.

Goyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0880243/","name":"Jim Uhls","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1334526/","name":"Simon Kinberg"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"U.S. trailer: Jumper","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi4155572505","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5NDE5MjE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjAzMjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNjI5NDE5MjE2NF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwNjAzMjEyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"This is the first U.S. theatrical trailer for Jumper, directed by Doug Liman.","datePublished":"2008-02-20","description":"A teenager with teleportation abilities suddenly finds himself in the middle of an ancient war between those like him and their sworn annihilators.","keywords":"teleportation,bank,theft,water,based on novel","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0489099/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"paul_3-960-896774","dateCreated":"2015-02-19","inLanguage":"English","name":"A slightly underrated entertaining movie","reviewBody":"Jumper is a decent movie, I might be a little bias because I've always liked this movie. The premise alone sounds amazing, the way its set up, how the characters are introduced, the action sequences, and the special effects are simply good. The film has elements of a superhero movie but is - more so than actual superhero movies these days - grounded in reality. There are very few futuristic looking gadgets, the locations and the weapons are all realistic, making the Jumpers feel like a secret part of society that could actually exist.

The characters in Jumpers seem like regular people. Millie (Rachel Bilson) acts and reacts like a normal girl whose not a comic book fan or someone who doesn't entertain the idea that teleportation is possibility. Griffin (Jamie Bell) is a bit a dick and David Rice (Hayden Christensen) doesn't even seem to realize what's happening to him, he lives in his bubble and doing his own thing - like most people would in his case.

The film does have its faults and for me there two main problems: The first, I've never read the book but from what I understand in the movie, a Jumper can withstand a large amount of electricity - higher than normal people do. But some of the hits David got in the action sequences should have killed him if he's physically like any human, which seem to be the case and would have been a great weakness to have for the character, a regular guy who can teleport. The second problems is the ending of the film, it's not the best, I could have come up with something better.

Anyway, I liked Jumper when it came out, even though I always knew that there wouldn't be a sequel. It's an entertaining movie and over the years, whenever I watched it back I found those little pop culture references that I hadn't notice before. For example this time around I noticed a Marvel Team up reference that is kind of overused but is still cool.

Frost"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0289833/","name":"Michael France"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0498278/","name":"Stan Lee"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Fantastic Video Trailer from 20th Century Fox Home Entertainment"},"datePublished":"2005-08-03","description":"A group of astronauts gain superpowers after a cosmic radiation exposure and must use them to oppose the plans of their enemy, Doctor Victor Von Doom.","keywords":"lingerie slip,fantastic four,masked man,flying,elasticity","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0120667/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"StevePulaski"},"dateCreated":"2015-08-13","inLanguage":"English","name":"Captures a time when superhero films were more joyful","reviewBody":"Fantastic Four is one of the last superhero films, that I can recall, that wasn't insufferably bleak or incredibly serious to a point where any shred of humor was seen as obtuse to the film's narrative. Yes, Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy is an indisputable breakthrough in superhero films, but it also made the seriousness of superhero films standard, something that would follow into the late 2000's and early 2010's as Marvel built up The Avengers. Fantastic Four reminds of the quirkiness superhero films were once predicated upon, and while it may get a bit too corny at times, and its focus can never really settle, it's also a very commercial film that satisfies on some level of entertainment when it gives every card in its deck a fair time to shine.

We open by looking at a physicist named Dr. Reed Richards (Ioan Gruffudd), who is convinced evolution was triggered millions of years ago by stray elements of cosmic energy in space, some of which will pass near Earth very soon. His pal, astronaut Ben Grimm (Michael Chiklis), works by his side on this potentially revolutionary discovery by helping him convince their old classmate Dr. Victor Von Doom (Julian McMahon), the CEO of Von Doom Industries, to allow both of them access to his private space station to further experiment with the effects of these cosmic energy particles. While Doom agrees, he winds up walking away with most of the profits that this experiment will bring, affirming Reed's desperation to make his project work.

Still, he persists on and brings his close friends Susan Storm (Jessica Alba) and her brother Johnny (Chris Evans) along for the ride. However, when a trip to outer space goes awry, exposure with the cosmic energy results in the four receiving deformities and enhanced human abilities that have never before been seen: Reed possesses the ability to stretch every limb of his body, Susan has the ability to disappear and reappear at her leisure, Johnny can have his body engulfed in flame simply by reciting the phrase "Flame on!," and Ben turns into a hideous, orange rock monster.

Following the four's mutations, writers Michael France and Mark Frost focus a great deal of their time on the agony that these mutations bring, particularly The Thing, who experiences his wife leaving him shortly after revealing his deformity. While this agony is a solid angle (one I'd argue necessary in most superhero films), too much of the time is spent profiling The Thing and not enough on the remaining characters of the film. Reed and Ben, who are ultimately the film's main focus, wind up monopolizing too much of the picture, and any time we see Johnny is when he's right in the middle of making a smug comment or being his typical, womanizing self.

The action in Fantastic Four has a colorful commercial look to it, brilliantly bold and very vibrant in a way that makes many of the scenes pop with life. It manages to achieve a comic book aesthetic without resorting to picture-in-picture editing. One particularly involving scene takes place on a suspension bridge, where The Thing is seen pummeling everything in his sight and the remaining three members of the team must resort to either relaxing him or protecting drivers and innocent bystanders.

The goofiness in Fantastic Four, however, in an age of dark superhero films that come with slick aesthetics and brooding characters, is a delightful change of pace. Yes, there is a point when one wishes director Tim Story, France, and Frost would command a tighter grip on the seriousness of the writing, but the pulpy fun of Fantastic Four, in addition to the effects and the neatly choreographed action, keep it a moving, satisfying spectacle that is more than just colors flying around on screen, trying to find their place.

Starring: Ioan Gruffudd, Jessica Alba, Chris Evans, Michael Chiklis, and Julian McMahon. Directed by: Tim Story.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":315278,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":5.7},"duration":"PT1H46M"}</script><metacontent="

However when a nosy reporter starts snooping around she rekindles the memories of the soldiers, one wants to go home and the other wants to kill the other. Jean-Claude Van Damme and Dolph Lundgren together in one film doesn't exactly bring up expectations of quality. However Universal Soldier manages to be far more entertaining than one would've guessed and not even in guilty pleasure way. The action is rather spectacular and while Van Damme and Lundgren are rather well suited to their parts. The secondary characters such as Jerry Orbach,Ed O'Ross and Ally Walker only provide our hero and villain with targets to shoot at but for mindless enjoyment, you can certainly do worse.\n\n* *1/2 out 4-(Pretty good)","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":6}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":84286,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6},"duration":"PT1H42M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Star Trek Into Darkness
Zvjezdane staze: U tami
programme.desc:
Star Trek Into Darkness: Directed by J.J. Abrams. With Chris Pine, Zachary Quinto, Zoe Saldana, Karl Urban. After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1408101/","name":"Star Trek Into Darkness","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTk2NzczOTgxNF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwODQ5ODczOQ@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"PG-13","genre":["Action","Adventure","Sci-Fi"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1517976/","name":"Chris Pine"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0704270/","name":"Zachary Quinto"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0757855/","name":"Zoe Saldana"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0009190/","name":"J.J. Abrams"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0023400/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0152219/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0021593/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0649460/","name":"Roberto Orci"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0476064/","name":"Alex Kurtzman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0511541/","name":"Damon Lindelof"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Blu-ray Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi410167577","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDU4MjI0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY1NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMjIwNDU4MjI0NV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODY1NzAzMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"New on Blu-ray: After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one man weapon of mass destruction."},"datePublished":"2013-05-15","description":"After the crew of the Enterprise find an unstoppable force of terror from within their own organization, Captain Kirk leads a manhunt to a war-zone world to capture a one-man weapon of mass destruction.","keywords":"sequel to a reboot,star trek,human female,adult daughter,james t. kirk character","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1408101/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"rooprect"},"dateCreated":"2021-01-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Lots of references to old Trek can't make up for lazy writing... Well OK maybe it can.","reviewBody":"Golly I think my title sums up everything I wanted to say. As far as basic plot goes, there's nothing particularly new here: a psycho super being plans to kill people and blow up things while the Enterprise is, for the millionth time, "the only ship in the quadrant". This movie is very lazily written, sort of like that homework assignment you slapped together on the bus to school but with a multi zillion dollar budget. But before you transport off this page, bear in mind the film's saving grace...

There are a ton of groan-worthy, yet very effective, references to the old Star Trek universe, making this a pretty entertaining watch even though I sound like I'm slamming it harder than a shuttle craft making Emergency Landing Plan B ("B! As in BARRICADE"). That plus a ton of dazzling special effects and nonstop action prompt me to rate this movie a definite WORTHWHILE WATCH, even though my inner Trek nerd is screaming for you to avoid it like that episode "Spock's Brain".

No, this is NOT a remake of the incomparable "Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan" (1982) although it does feature the characters Khan as well as Dr. Carol Marcus.

No, Khan does not show off his bulging pecs as only the late great Ricardo Montalban could do.

YES, there is a sneaky remake of the famous radiation "you'll flood the chamber" scene which is fun to watch.

YES, Chris Pine does an admirable job of playing Captain Kirk as the charmingly arrogant young captain who doesn't like to lose.

YES, Zachary Quinto does an admirable job of playing the stoic Mr Spock, and YES there is a cameo by Leonard Nimoy as the original Spock.

YES, Dr, McCoy says "Dammit Jim I'm a doctor not a ---!"

and lastly, YES, at a certain point in the movie someone does, in fact, yell: "KHAAaaAaAAAAAaaANNN!!!"

So what more needs to be said. Great popcorn flick. Fun little nods to the old Trek series. It doesn't require too many brain cells. But then again, neither does "Spock's Brain" and we still love it."},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":467625,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.7},"duration":"PT2H12M"}</script><metacontent="

credits.actor: Michael Copon, Karen Shenaz David, Simon Quarterman, Tom Wu, Randy Couture, Andreas Wisniewski, Natalie Becker, Jeremy Crutchley
Zack Ward, Monica May, Kevin Thompson, John Duerler, Stephen Settgast, Meg Cionni, Kimberly Arland, Erik Betts

programme.title: Zvjezdane staze: U tami
programme.desc: Kada nemilosrdni zločinac zvan Khan objavi rat Federaciji, kapetan Kirk, Spock i smiona posada "U. S. S. Enterprisea" kreću u najveću potjeru za kriminalcem u povijesti. Kada posadu "Enterprisea" pozovu kući, otkriju da je nezaustavljivi terorist unutar njihove organizacije detonirao flotu i sve što ona predstavlja ostavivši svijet u kriznome stanju. S osobnom osvetom na umu, kapetan Kirk predvodi potjeru za kriminalcem u ratnu zonu kako bi ulovio oružje masovnog uništenja utjelovljeno u jednome čovjeku. Dok naši junaci igraju epsku partiju šaha na život i smrt, ljubav će biti ugrožena, prijateljstva prekinuta, a Kirk će se morati žrtvovati za jedinu obitelj koja mu je preostala: svoju posadu.

credits.actor: Michael Copon, Karen Shenaz David, Simon Quarterman, Tom Wu, Randy Couture, Andreas Wisniewski, Natalie Becker, Jeremy Crutchley
Zack Ward, Monica May, Kevin Thompson, John Duerler, Stephen Settgast, Meg Cionni, Kimberly Arland, Erik Betts

programme.title: Fantastična četvorka
programme.desc: Fantastična četvorka suvremena je verzija Marvelova izvornog i najdugovječnijeg tima superheroja, a prati četvero mladih autsajdera koje teleportiraju u alternativan i opasan svemir. Promijeniš li svijet, budi ga spreman braniti. Prijatelji Reed Richard (Miles Teller) i Ben Grimm (Jamie Bell) još od djetinjstva rade na svom prototipu teleportera, čime privuku pozornost profesora Franklina Storma (Reg E. Cathey), ravnatelja Baxter foundacije, instituta sponzoriranog od strane vlade, koji okuplja mlade genijalce. Reed je pozvan da im se pridruži te pomogne znanstvenici Sue Storm (Kate Mare) i Johnnyju Stormu (Michael B. Jordan) kako bi završili "kvantna vrata", koji je dizajnirao Stormov stićenik Victor von Doom (Toby Kebbell). Eksperiment je uspješan, a voditelj projekta, doktor Allen (Tim Blake Nelson) sada planira poslati grupu iz NASA-e u paralelnu dimenziju. Razočarani što se ne mogu pridružiti ekspediciji, Reed, Johnny, Victor i Ben planiraju neovlašteno iskoristiti kvantna vrata kako bi sami otišli u paralelnu dimenziju, nazvanu "Planet zero".

III","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2107752217","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2MWRmMDEtNTlhNC00N2NmLThmYzktYzVhOWM1OWEwNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZjc2MWRmMDEtNTlhNC00N2NmLThmYzktYzVhOWM1OWEwNGNjXkEyXkFqcGdeQTNwaW5nZXN0._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer return.","keywords":"mirror,building,little girl,haunting,teenage girl","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0095889/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"dormdrippingblood"},"dateCreated":"2011-07-02","inLanguage":"English","name":"At least it has the location and the effects going for it.","reviewBody":"If you want to see how many times someone can yell "Carol Anne!" in 90 minutes, I guess you'd be into this. I think they set a world record for how many times the main character's name is mentioned throughout the movie.

The plot is standard sequel stuff: Carol Anne, the little girl plagued by paranormal phenomena in the first two movies, now stays with her bitchy aunt and her husband and daughter in a huge Chicago high rise building. Unfortunately for everyone, some prick counselor at her new school has been putting her under hypnosis to deal with the events of her past (he believes she has the power to produce mass hallucinations and is a manipulative liar despite witnessing paranormal activity in her presence--smart man). This therapy apparently opens her up and leaves her vulnerable to Kane, the preacher that wants her to lead them to the other side. Kane shows up in mirrors and other reflective surfaces (like puddles) and uses them to attack.

I've never seen so many mirrors in one movie. Even Carol Anne's bedroom walls are just big mirrors (I guess she hasn't hit that self-conscious stage yet). The hallways are mirrored. The elevators--mirrored. The poor girl has to go to the parking garage just to get away from all of the damn mirrors and it still doesn't end well for her.

There is some mildly entertaining subplot involving Lara Flynn Boyle's character, Donna, and her love interest with really bad '80s hair sneaking their friends into the building's pool after-hours. If you enjoy watching bad '80s fashion, you'll love these guys.

Once Kane starts to attack, Tangina, the short lady with the grating voice, comes back to help Carol Anne and her new family.

The movie manages to be pretty creepy by utilizing its inspired location--the building is often genuinely menacing. The mirror effects make up for some pretty corny dialogue and the characters' tendency to yell "Carol Anne!" every other minute.

Could have been much better if the script was worked on, but as-is, it's just a formulaic sequel with some average acting. Entertaining enough for a watch if you're not expecting anything close to the original.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":17323,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.7},"duration":"PT1H38M"}</script><metacontent="

least it has the location and the effects going for it.","reviewBody":"If you want to see how many times someone can yell "Carol Anne!" in 90 minutes, I guess you'd be into this. I think they set a world record for how many times the main character's name is mentioned throughout the movie.

The plot is standard sequel stuff: Carol Anne, the little girl plagued by paranormal phenomena in the first two movies, now stays with her bitchy aunt and her husband and daughter in a huge Chicago high rise building. Unfortunately for everyone, some prick counselor at her new school has been putting her under hypnosis to deal with the events of her past (he believes she has the power to produce mass hallucinations and is a manipulative liar despite witnessing paranormal activity in her presence--smart man). This therapy apparently opens her up and leaves her vulnerable to Kane, the preacher that wants her to lead them to the other side. Kane shows up in mirrors and other reflective surfaces (like puddles) and uses them to attack.

I've never seen so many mirrors in one movie. Even Carol Anne's bedroom walls are just big mirrors (I guess she hasn't hit that self-conscious stage yet). The hallways are mirrored. The elevators--mirrored. The poor girl has to go to the parking garage just to get away from all of the damn mirrors and it still doesn't end well for her.

There is some mildly entertaining subplot involving Lara Flynn Boyle's character, Donna, and her love interest with really bad '80s hair sneaking their friends into the building's pool after-hours. If you enjoy watching bad '80s fashion, you'll love these guys.

Once Kane starts to attack, Tangina, the short lady with the grating voice, comes back to help Carol Anne and her new family.

The movie manages to be pretty creepy by utilizing its inspired location--the building is often genuinely menacing. The mirror effects make up for some pretty corny dialogue and the characters' tendency to yell "Carol Anne!" every other minute.

Could have been much better if the script was worked on, but as-is, it's just a formulaic sequel with some average acting. programme.title: Species: The Awakening
Vrste 4: Buđenje
programme.desc:
Species: The Awakening: Directed by Nick Lyon. With Edy Arellano, Marco Bacuzzi, Jan Bouda, Ben Cross. When she reaches the end of her lifespan, a scientist rushes to Mexico, in order to save the half-breed alien seductress he raised as his docile niece, but soon awakens the deadly, sexual predator inside her." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0844894/","name":"Species: The Awakening","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMwNjA1OTAzOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNjgxMTM4NA@@._V1_.jpg","contentRating":"Not Rated","genre":["Action","Adventure","Horror"],"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1060250/","name":"Edy Arellano"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0045888/","name":"Marco Bacuzzi"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm2947417/","name":"Jan Bouda"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0528963/","name":"Nick Lyon"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0157610/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0007143/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0271022/","name":"Dennis Feldman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1618286/","name":"Ben Ripley"}],"datePublished":"2007-10-02","description":"When she reaches the end of her lifespan, a scientist rushes to Mexico, in order to save the half-breed alien seductress he raised as his docile niece, but soon awakens the deadly, sexual predator inside her.","keywords":"sex with an alien woman,sex,partial nudity,female frontal nudity,bare breasts","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844894/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"vampyrecowboy"},"dateCreated":"2008-12-26","inLanguage":"English","name":"This shouldn't be a Species movie","reviewBody":"It just didn't work.

Alien nun? WTF? Alien taxi driver? And he tries to kill his passenger for what reason? They live in Mexico? Where where they the rest of the time? So why are they suddenly just killing people when Ben Cross and the Blonde chick come into town? Wasn't good...wasn't scary, wasn't science fiction...just wasn't workable.

The writers could have come up with something more creative for the paycheck...and the locations could have been chosen better too.

Basically, it all could have been better.

Yeah...as far as sequels go...it should be written by the same people - especially if the script was big enough to have a sequel.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":4}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":6575,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":4.1},"duration":"PT1H43M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Afflicted
Pogođen
programme.desc: Directed by Derek Lee, Clif Prowse. With Clif Prowse, Derek Lee, Michael Gill, Baya Rehaz. Two best friends see their trip of a lifetime take a dark turn when one of them is struck by a mysterious affliction. Now, in a foreign land, they race to uncover the source before it consumes him completely.

character,gift","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094862/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ChrisOfficial"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Child's Play","reviewBody":"Incredible 1980's Horror Classic About Serial Killer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) who was mortally wounded in a police shoot-out, he uses a voodoo spell to transfer his soul into Chucky, a "Good Guys" doll. Andy (Alex Vincent) receives the doll as a birthday gift, and Chucky soon resumes his killing spree. However, Charles doesn't want to be trapped in the body of a doll forever. His only escape would be to transfer into the first human he revealed his true identity to... which places Andy in mortal danger.\n\nAmazing performance by Alex Vincent who starred as Andy. Amazing performance by Brad Dourif who played the voice of Chucky. Also great performance by Catherine Hicks and the entire cast. Chucky was funny and horrifying dangerous. I recommend Child's Play to all audiences. The child's play series are great and it would be amazing to see more and more made. I recommend them. GREAT THRILLER!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90115,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.desc: Radnja prati veoma popularnog američkog pisca koji nakon tragedije u kojoj mu poludeli fan ubije ženu i dete, dobija poziv iz Barselone da mu je otac na samrti. On se upućuje tamo kako bi proveo s... Radnja prati veoma popularnog američkog pisca koji nakon tragedije u kojoj mu poludeli fan ubije ženu i dete, dobija poziv iz Barselone da mu je otac na samrti. On se upućuje tamo kako bi proveo s njim poslednje dane uz priliku da popravi odnose sa otuđenim bratom. Tamo će shvatiti da mu je život, kao i život njegovih bližnjih označen brojem 11 i da je 11.11.11. više od datuma - to je upozorenje.

character,gift","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0094862/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"ChrisOfficial"},"dateCreated":"2013-07-18","inLanguage":"English","name":"Child's Play","reviewBody":"Incredible 1980's Horror Classic About Serial Killer Charles Lee Ray (Brad Dourif) who was mortally wounded in a police shoot-out, he uses a voodoo spell to transfer his soul into Chucky, a "Good Guys" doll. Andy (Alex Vincent) receives the doll as a birthday gift, and Chucky soon resumes his killing spree. However, Charles doesn't want to be trapped in the body of a doll forever. His only escape would be to transfer into the first human he revealed his true identity to... which places Andy in mortal danger.\n\nAmazing performance by Alex Vincent who starred as Andy. Amazing performance by Brad Dourif who played the voice of Chucky. Also great performance by Catherine Hicks and the entire cast. Chucky was funny and horrifying dangerous. I recommend Child's Play to all audiences. The child's play series are great and it would be amazing to see more and more made. I recommend them. GREAT THRILLER!"},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":90115,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.6},"duration":"PT1H27M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Belko Experiment
Belkov eksperiment
programme.desc: Directed by Greg McLean. With John Gallagher Jr., Tony Goldwyn, Adria Arjona, John C. McGinley. In a twisted social experiment, eighty Americans are locked in their high-rise corporate office in Bogotá, Colombia, and ordered by an unknown voice coming from the company's intercom system to participate in a deadly game of kill or be killed.

credits.actor: Brigid Brannagh, Allison Lange, Brian Krause, Rosa Blasi, Joe Regalbuto, Lin Shaye, Charlie Stewart, Jordan Baker

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.

programme.title: Fargo
programme.desc: Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Emmit Stussy, "kralj parkirališta Minnesote", zgodan je, samoostvareni mogul nekretnina sa savršenom porodicom, prava američka priča o uspjehu. Ray je više upozoravajuća priča. Umoran od života u Emmitovoj sjeni, Ray je proćelav, debeljuškast socijalni radnik koji je silno ogorčen kartama koje su mu podijeljene, a za to okrivljuje brata. Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Opasna igra
programme.desc: Radnja serije prati brilijantnu ali istovrmeno nemilosrdnu advokaticu Peti Hjuz, njenu štićenicu Elen Parsons i advokatsku kancelariju Hjuz u Njujorku. Upoznajte mladu, inteligentnu, ambicioznu i diplomiranu pravnicu, Elen Parsons (Rouz Birne) koja je postala štićenica Patricije Hivs (Glen Klouz), nemilosrdne advokatice s dugogodišnjim iskustvom, kojoj baš ništa ne predstavlja prepreku do dobijanja parnice. Peti je osoba kojoj ne sme ništa stati na put, jer ona će manipulacijom i dobrom, ali i opasnom strategijom doći do svog cilja.

programme.title: Biti Eve
programme.desc: Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta... Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta veza raspala. Ona završava sa jednim dečkom po imenu Sam Hooper, sa kojim se prvi put poljubila, još dok su bili djeca.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

Njihovo bratsko suparništvo vodi ih na krivi put koji počinje sitnim krađama, ali ubrzo dovodi do ubistava, mafijaša i surovog natjecateljskog bridža. Sitno suparništvo između dvojice braće eskalira i donosi haos maloj minesotskoj zajednici.

programme.title: Sajnfeld
programme.desc: Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet... Serija koja je počela kao svaki drugi sitkom, a izrasla u najkompleksnije televizijsko remek delo, krije se iza prezimena jednog stand up komičara. Sajnfeld je kultni naslov iza kojeg stoji devet Emija, tri Zlatna globusa i pregršt drugih nagrada, čiji je broj mali u odnosu na višemilionski auditorijum koji je svake nedelje sedeo pred televizijskih ekrana kako bi video šta to njemu večeras na tako smešan i komičan način, smeta. Džeri je komičar koji ima najboljeg prijatelja, bivšu devojku koja mu postaje najbolja prijateljica i komšiju koji mu postaje deo života. Itekako mu ide sa ženama, ali nijedna mu ne odgovara: ili ima veliki nos, ili je prelepa, ali ne baš pod svakim svetlom itd...ali vremenom mu sve to postaje dosadno i odluči da menja svoj život.

credits.actor: Denis Leary, Michael Lombardi, Steven Pasquale, Andrea Roth, John Scurti, Daniel Sunjata, Callie Thorne, Natalie Distler

programme.title: Opasna igra
programme.desc: Radnja serije prati brilijantnu ali istovrmeno nemilosrdnu advokaticu Peti Hjuz, njenu štićenicu Elen Parsons i advokatsku kancelariju Hjuz u Njujorku. Upoznajte mladu, inteligentnu, ambicioznu i diplomiranu pravnicu, Elen Parsons (Rouz Birne) koja je postala štićenica Patricije Hivs (Glen Klouz), nemilosrdne advokatice s dugogodišnjim iskustvom, kojoj baš ništa ne predstavlja prepreku do dobijanja parnice. Peti je osoba kojoj ne sme ništa stati na put, jer ona će manipulacijom i dobrom, ali i opasnom strategijom doći do svog cilja.

programme.title: Biti Eve
programme.desc: Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta... Biti Eve je serija fokusirana na tinejdžerku, Evu Baxter i njene dnevne probleme. Njeni su roditelji razvedeni, ali žive jedno do drugog. Eve je bila zaljubljena u dječaka po imenu Adam, ali se ta veza raspala. Ona završava sa jednim dečkom po imenu Sam Hooper, sa kojim se prvi put poljubila, još dok su bili djeca.

programme.title: Monk Mali Pas
programme.desc: Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli. Monk je veseli mali pas koji uporno daje sve od sebe, ali uvijek pogriješi! Kad stvari krenu po zlu za Monka, slijedi katastrofa jer sve vrlo lako može brzo izmaknuti kontroli.

credits.actor: Bob Odenkirk, Rhea Seehorn, Jonathan Banks, Michael McKean, Patrick Fabian, Michael Mando, Julie Ann Emery, Jeremy Shamos

programme.title: Škola Crna rupa
programme.desc: Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi. Pet učenika i njihov nastavnik istražuju paranormalne pojave koje se dešavu u njihovoj školi.

programme.title: Škorpija
programme.desc: Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine:... Serija se temelji na istinitoj priči i prati genija Voltera O'Brajena (Elyes Gabel) i njegovog tima sjajnih čudesa koji se bore protiv složenih visokotehnoloških prijetnji modernog vremena. Tim čine: Tobi Kurtis (Eddie Kaye Thomas), fini bihevioralista; Hapi Kin (Jadyn Wong) vunderkind za mehaniku i Silvester Dod (Ari Stidham), odličan statističar. Iako se međusobno odlično razumiju, vanjski svijet je za njih zagonetka. Srećom, Pejdž Dinin (Katharine McPhee) ima mladog sina koji će ih "prevesti" u vanjski svijet. Svi pobjeđuju s ovim timom: svojom izuzetnom domišljatošću rješavaju nacionalne krize, pomažući sebi da se uklope u stvarni svijet.
